description: This file defines API endpoints related to recipe search and retrieval using FastAPI framework. It uses a dedicated Spoonacular client to fetch recipe data, handles various error conditions, and documents API responses.

classes.name: SpoonacularErrorResponse
classes.description: Model for standard error responses from Spoonacular-related API endpoints.

methods.name: search_recipes( q: str = Query(..., description="Search query"), number: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="Number of results to return (max 50)"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), diet: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Diet filter, e.g., vegetarian, vegan"), cuisine: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Cuisine filter, e.g., italian, mexican"), intolerances: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Comma-separated intolerances, e.g., gluten,dairy"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to search for recipes using Spoonacular's complexSearch, with optional filters and pagination.

methods.name: get_recipe_details( recipe_id: int, include_nutrition: bool = Query(False, description="Whether to include nutrition information"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve detailed information about a recipe by its Spoonacular recipe ID.

ctags.name: detail
ctags.pattern: /^    detail: str = Field(..., description="Error message describing the failure")$/

ctags.name: get_recipe_details
ctags.signature: ( recipe_id: int, include_nutrition: bool = Query(False, description="Whether to include nutrition information"), )

ctags.name: search_recipes
ctags.signature: ( q: str = Query(..., description="Search query"), number: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50, description="Number of results to return (max 50)"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"), diet: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Diet filter, e.g., vegetarian, vegan"), cuisine: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Cuisine filter, e.g., italian, mexican"), intolerances: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Comma-separated intolerances, e.g., gluten,dairy"), )
